text:
"Something Just like This" is an electropop song by American DJ duo The Chainsmokers, with British band Coldplay. It was released on February 22, 2017, as the lead single from The Chainsmokers' album, "Memories…Do Not Open" (2017).
The song reached the top two in Australia and the UK and the top three in the US and Canada. It reached number one on the US Pop Songs radio chart and in Belgium (Flanders). It reached the top five in nine other countries. "Something Just like This" finished at number five on "Billboard"<nowiki/>'s 2017 Year-End Hot 100.
"Something Just like This" has been certified quadruple-platinum in the US for shipments and streams of over four million copies.
